statements: SELECT * FROM SoloTravelDestinations;
SELECT destination_name, user_rating FROM SoloTravelDestinations WHERE user_rating > 4;
SELECT destination_name, user_reviews FROM SoloTravelDestinations ORDER BY user_reviews DESC;
SELECT * FROM SoloTravelDestinations WHERE travel_preferences = 'Beach';
SELECT destination_name, user_rating, user_reviews FROM SoloTravelDestinations WHERE user_rating > 4 AND travel_preferences = 'City';
SELECT * FROM SoloTravelDestinations WHERE user_rating > 4.5;
SELECT destination_name, user_rating FROM SoloTravelDestinations ORDER BY user_rating DESC;
SELECT destination_name, user_reviews FROM SoloTravelDestinations WHERE user_reviews > 100 ORDER BY user_reviews ASC;
SELECT destination_name, travel_preferences FROM SoloTravelDestinations WHERE travel_preferences = 'Beach';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_destinations, AVG(user_rating) AS avg_rating FROM SoloTravelDestinations;
SELECT * FROM solo_travel_destinations;
SELECT destination_name, avg_rating FROM solo_travel_destinations ORDER BY avg_rating DESC;
SELECT destination_name, num_reviews FROM solo_travel_destinations WHERE avg_rating > 4.5;
SELECT * FROM solo_travel_destinations WHERE destination_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, preference_1, preference_2 FROM user_preferences ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT destination_name, avg_rating FROM solo_travel_destinations WHERE avg_rating > 4
SELECT * FROM solo_travel_destinations ORDER BY destination_name DESC
SELECT destination_name, num_reviews FROM solo_travel_destinations WHERE num_reviews > 100 ORDER BY num_reviews DESC
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE preference_1 LIKE '%beach%'
SELECT user_id, preference_1, preference_2 FROM user_preferences ORDER BY preference_1
SELECT * FROM popular_destinations;
SELECT destination, reviews_count, average_rating FROM popular_destinations WHERE destination_id = 2;
SELECT destination, reviews_count, most_visited_season FROM popular_destinations ORDER BY reviews_count DESC;
SELECT destination, most_visited_season FROM popular_destinations WHERE average_rating >= 4.5;
SELECT destination, reviews_count, most_visited_season FROM popular_destinations LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT destination, budget FROM user_preferences WHERE budget < 1000;
SELECT destination, budget, duration_hrs, best_season FROM user_preferences ORDER BY destination ASC;
SELECT destination, average_rating, most_visited_season FROM popular_destinations WHERE reviews_count > 100 ORDER BY average_rating DESC;
SELECT review_text FROM destination_reviews WHERE rating >= 4 AND date_posted > '2021-01-01'
SELECT * FROM destinations;
SELECT destination_name, rating FROM destinations WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT user_name, age, gender FROM users WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT destination_name, rating, user_reviews FROM destinations ORDER BY rating DESC;

SELECT users.user_name, destinations.destination_name, reviews.rating FROM users INNER JOIN reviews ON users.user_id = reviews.user_id INNER JOIN destinations ON reviews.destination_id = destinations.destination_id;
SELECT * FROM destinations ORDER BY rating DESC, user_reviews ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT destination_name, rating, user_reviews FROM destinations JOIN preferences ON destinations.destination_id = preferences.destination_id;

SELECT user_name, age, gender, destination_name, rating FROM users INNER JOIN reviews ON users.user_id = reviews.user_id INNER JOIN destinations ON reviews.destination_id = destinations.destination_id WHERE age > 25 AND gender = 'Female';

SELECT user_name, destination_name, rating, review_text FROM users JOIN reviews ON users.user_id = reviews.user_id JOIN destinations ON reviews.destination_id = destinations.destination_id WHERE rating > 4.5 ORDER BY rating DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT destination_name, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM destinations JOIN reviews ON destinations.destination_id = reviews.destination_id GROUP BY destination_name HAVING avg_rating > 4.0 ORDER BY avg_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM destinations ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, rating FROM destinations WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT name, description FROM destinations WHERE rating < 3 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name FROM destinations WHERE id = 3 OR id = 5;
SELECT * FROM destinations WHERE name LIKE '%beach%'
SELECT name, rating FROM destinations WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age >= 25 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT u.username, d.name, r.rating FROM users u JOIN reviews r ON u.id = r.user_id JOIN destinations d ON r.destination_id = d.id WHERE r.rating > 4;
SELECT d.name, AVG(r.rating) AS avg_rating FROM destinations d JOIN reviews r ON d.id = r.destination_id GROUP BY d.name;
SELECT p.user_id, u.username, COUNT(p.id) AS preference_count FROM preferences p JOIN users u ON p.user_id = u.id GROUP BY p.user_id, u.username HAVING COUNT(p.id) > 3;
